comments:
I got another one of the "sync partner not registered" errors when cancelling 
a merge. It does not seem to be reproducable. However, after the failure, no 
subscriber was active (only CVS Workspace was in the list) and the Cancel menu 
item was still enabled. Choosing it caused an NPE.

I found the folloiwng traceback in the log. It looks like it's the delta 
processing that's causing the problem. That is, a delta comes in and is being 
processed while the subscriber is being cancelled.

The last trace was on shitdown. Here's another one during the merge itself. 
Odd that it occurs here. Perhaps there was old state remaining after a failed 
cancel.
